main module

async main.add_acc(acc: Acc)[source]

Endpoint that receives an account with entity and stores.

Parameters:

acc – JSON file that has the fields corresponding to the Acc class.

Raises:

HTTPException – If an account with the same name already: HTTPException: If an entity not exists in the database:

Returns:

Created string message

async main.add_entity(entity: Entity)[source]

Endpoint that receives a payment entity and stores.

Parameters:

entity – JSON file that has the fields corresponding to the Entity class.

Raises:

HTTPException – If an entity with the same name already exists in the database.

Returns:

a JSON with the ID of the new entity.

async main.check_list_acc_params(entity: int = Query(None), type: str = Query(None), id: int = Query(None))[source]

Is a parameter validation function on an endpoint.

Parameters:

  • entity – id of Entity in the database.

  • type – type of Acc [operation, administrative].

  • id – id of Acc in the database.

Raises:

HTTPException – if none of the 3 parameters are passed.

Returns:

Value of 3 parameters.

async main.list_acc(params: tuple = Depends(check_list_acc_params))[source]

An endpoint that receives multiple parameters to query acc payable.

Parameters:

params – Entity id, type and id of acc payable as query parameter.

Raises:

HTTPException – if the parameters return no acc payable.

Returns:

The acc payable that correspond to the parameters.
